com.limelight.videosdk

Interface IPlayerControl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayerFragment.PlayerControl, PlayerSupportFragment.PlayerControl

    public interface IPlayerControl
    This interface is the control to the Player.
    A child object of this interface is supplied to the Activity which requested for the Player. It is used to control the player like playing,pausing etc. It also sets the video content for player.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getPlaylistPosition()
      To get the current play position in playlist.
      void pause()
      This method programmatically pause the player.
      void play(String data, ContentService contentSrvc)
      To play player by program.
      Call play with media id to fetch the encoding, get the delivery and play the media.
      Call play with encoding url to play the media for the selected encoding.
      void playChannel(String channelId, ContentService contentService, IPlaylistCallback playlist)
      To play all the media in a channel.
      void playInPlaylist(int position)
      To play a particular media in a channel.
      void setAutoPlay(boolean isAutoPlay)
      To set the autoplay for channel playlist.
      void stop()
      This method programmatically stops the player.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        void play(String data,
        ContentService contentSrvc)
        To play player by program.
        Call play with media id to fetch the encoding, get the delivery and play the media.
        Call play with encoding url to play the media for the selected encoding.
        Parameters:
        data - media to play
        contentSrvc - ContentService which fetched this media.

      • playChannel

        void playChannel(String channelId,
               ContentService contentService,
               IPlaylistCallback playlist)
        To play all the media in a channel. Channel acts as a playlist.
        Parameters:
        channelId - Channel id to play.
        contentService - ContentService which fetched this channelid
        playlist - playlist callback

      • pause

        void pause()
        This method programmatically pause the player.

      • stop

        void stop()
        This method programmatically stops the player.

      • setAutoPlay

        void setAutoPlay(boolean isAutoPlay)
        To set the autoplay for channel playlist.
        Parameters:
        isAutoPlay - true if autoplay playlist else false

      • getPlaylistPosition

        int getPlaylistPosition()
        To get the current play position in playlist.
        Returns:
        current play position

      • playInPlaylist

        void playInPlaylist(int position)
        To play a particular media in a channel. Channel acts as a playlist.
        Parameters:
        position - position in playlist
